scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build
scripts.update: npm update; bower update; dtsm update --save
scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run build-ts; npm run build-babel; npm run build-browserify
scripts.build-test: rm -f test/*.js; npm run build-test-ts; npm run build-test-espower
scripts.build-test-ts: tsc --target test --module commonjs --noEmitOnError --noImplicitAny --rootDir test --outdir test --declaration src/*.ts
scripts.build-test-espower: for i in `find test -name test*.js`; do node node_modules/espower-cli/bin/cmd.js $i > $i.js; done
